meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the care of children.
meanings.sent1: The pediatrists at the hospital are experts in treating young patients.
meanings.sent2: Pediatrists play a crucial role in keeping children healthy.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pediatrists bring a toy stethoscope to the party? To check the 'heartbeats' of the toys!
meanings.sent4: The pediatrists are like superheroes, fighting off illnesses to protect the little ones.
meanings.sent5: The smiling faces of the children leaving the pediatrists' office show their trust and comfort.

meanings.definition: The practice of medicine focused on the treatment of children.
meanings.sent1: Pediatrists dedicate their skills to healing and helping young patients.
meanings.sent2: In pediatrics, pediatrists use specialized knowledge to care for children.
meanings.sent3: The pediatrists' clinic had a 'no adults allowed' sign as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The love and care provided by pediatrists act as a healing balm for worried parents.
meanings.sent5: The colorful waiting room of the pediatrists' office is designed to soothe anxious children.

meanings.definition: The profession of caring for the health and well-being of children.
meanings.sent1: Pediatrists have a noble calling to safeguard the health of youngsters.
meanings.sent2: The pediatrists' job involves nurturing the growth and development of kids.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pediatrists carry a teddy bear? To comfort the scared little patients!
meanings.sent4: The dedication of pediatrists shines brightly in the smiles of healthy children.
meanings.sent5: The laughter echoing in the pediatrists' office is a testament to their compassionate care.
